scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ seated on a throne, adorned in white robes with gold ornamentation and a green undergarment. He holds a red, bejeweled book in his left hand and raises his right hand in a gesture of blessing or teaching. Surrounding him are figures, rendered in blue, who appear to be a congregation or heavenly host. The throne is draped with a rich red and gold patterned fabric. The overall composition is framed by an elaborate, colorful border, suggesting a divine or celestial setting.
